den den aluthin join wene aya padiyath danegene, tatwet danegen join wenne. ehema wela lamainwa isserehata dala , me wage tatwekadi rata anathure dagene mehema kerepu ayata padi nemei padi kapanne watinne. anith job wela ayath strike kerot eyalatath padi wedi kerenewada? monewada me wikare. strike krepu ayata daduwamak denne oni kiyane ekai mage mate. kawru mona quat. ratakne meke. vigadam maduwak nemei. guruwaruth daneganne oni keranne oni dei nokeranne oni dei.  samawenne oni, kage hari hithe ridunanm, namuth, kelin wede keranne oni. apita rate minissunta salli na. rajayata adayama adu wela hodetama, ee thiyeddi, mehema kerene eke warediiii.

oyata mokak hari arias ekak thiyenawada guruwaru ekka ? guruwaru aurudu 24 k dewaarudayen kanna bonne adun paladum nathuwa bhawane idhala parata bahala thepal, dumriya, waraye, saukyaye wage niyama wurthikayo wela pennuwa ithan anduwa adala illeem walin kotasak dunna echarai. nurse la doctor la strike karala padi wadi kara gaththe e hema kenama corona roogin ekka wada karanne nahane. oyalath illala balanna api wage parata bahala strike karanna padiya wadi kara ganna ona nam katawath ekata epa kiyanna bahane. strike karana anik ayatath danduwamak denna kiyanna apita wage mokada wenne kiyala balanna

These are my thoughts. Teaching is one of the noble professions in the world.But all the teachers are not suitable for teaching.some of them have more knowledge, but can't give or explain it for students.They are the failures of the profession. Some teachers are doing various attractive methods to give the idea of the lessons to the students. Those who try to do their best are not greedy for money.It is self satisfaction. They do not conduct any tution classes.But do their duty at the school correctly.Till the month of May they did online classes by paying their own bills and data cards for Internet. So..think twice about teachers.They are human beings as all of you...
